overview: In the beautiful Yunding Village, the young village chief, who is passionate about the people, encountered a series of thorny issues during the preparation of an international mountain marathon race in the village. He will make choices and insist on behalf of the collective and individual. Faced with the temptation of interest, the test of family ties, and the doubts in the ears, Fang will struggle to cross the thorns under his feet and run forward for his dreams.
title: Running to the Spring
